channel.title: Palaeobotany on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Palaeobotany on open-archaeo

item.title: analogue
item.description: Analogue and weighted averaging methods for palaeoecology.

item.title: AncientMetagenomeDir
item.description: Repository containing lists of all published ancient metagenome samples (and related).

item.title: ArboDat
item.description: A program package for registering and importing data of archaeobotanical analyses including contexts of samples as well as evaluation tools.

item.title: ArchaeolPhytoliths
item.description: Automated detection and classification of multi-cell phytoliths at genera and species-level using Deep Learning algorithm.

item.title: baydem
item.description: Bayesian tools for reconstructing past demography.

item.title: CharTool
item.description: CharTool is a macro tool for quantifying charcoal particles for paleoecological research applications.

item.title: coenocliner
item.description: An R package to simulate species occurences and abundances counts, along gradient.

item.title: coproID
item.description: CoproID helps you to identify the “true maker” of Illumina sequenced Coprolites/Paleofaeces by checking the microbiome composition and the endogenous DNA.

item.title: Crop_Origins_Phylo
item.description: Repository of Crop Origins database and Phylo Food phylogeny.

item.title: distantia
item.description: R package to compute dissimilarity between multivariate time series.

item.title: ethnobotanyR
item.description: R package for calculating quantitative ethnobotany indices.

item.title: frontiers-palaeo-additive-modelling
item.description: Modelling and feature detection in palaeoenvironmental time series using additive models.

item.title: GeoChronR
item.description: An integrated framework that allows scientists to generate state-of-the-art age models for their records, create time-uncertain ensembles of their data, analyze those ensembles with a number of commonly-used techniques, and visualize their results in an intuitive way.

item.title: ggvegan
item.description: ggplot-based plots for vegan.

item.title: paleocar
item.description: An R package implementing functions to perform spatio-temporal paleoclimate reconstruction from tree-rings using the CAR (Correlation Adjusted corRelation) approach of Zuber and Strimmer.

item.title: PaleoView
item.description: A visualization tool for paleoclimatic modeling data.

item.title: pbot-client
item.description: Integrative paleobotanical portal.

item.title: pollen_data_processing
item.description: some tools in respect to pollen data processing.

item.title: pollencount
item.description: This simulation tool aims to help students and researchers to start to see what pollen looks like under the microscope, and start to identify common pollen grains.

item.title: strativerse
item.description: A collection of time-stratigraphic publications.

item.title: tavo-a27
item.description: Ancient animal occurrence data from Uerpmann 1987, The Ancient Distribution of Ungulate Mammals in the Middle East, TAVO A27.

item.title: vegan
item.description: R package for community ecologists: popular ordination methods, ecological null models & diversity analysis.

item.title: vegan3d
item.description: Dynamic and static 3D plotting for vegan.
